description: Allow users to create new accounts with email and password
steps: Navigate to registration screen
Enter valid email, password, and confirm password
Submit registration form
Verify account creation success message
Confirm user is logged in automatically

description: Allow existing users to log into their accounts
steps: Navigate to login screen
Enter valid email and password credentials
Submit login form
Verify successful authentication
Confirm redirect to main dashboard

description: Allow users to view and edit their profile information including fitness goals
steps: Navigate to profile section
View current profile information
Edit profile fields (name, age, weight, height, goals)
Save profile changes
Verify updated information is displayed

description: Display searchable library of exercises with instructions and demonstrations
steps: Navigate to exercise library
Browse exercises by category or muscle group
Search for specific exercises using search bar
Select an exercise to view detailed instructions
Verify exercise images/videos load properly

description: Allow users to start, track, and complete workout sessions with sets, reps, and weights
steps: Start a new workout session
Add exercises to the workout
Log sets, reps, and weights for each exercise
Complete and save the workout session
Verify workout data is stored in history

description: Provide intuitive bottom tab or drawer navigation between main app sections
steps: Open the app and view main navigation
Tap on each navigation item
Verify correct screen loads for each section
Confirm active tab is highlighted
Test navigation from different app states

description: Display pre-built workout plans that users can browse and select
steps: Navigate to workout plans section
Browse available workout plans by category
View plan details including exercises and schedule
Select a workout plan to follow
Verify plan is added to user's active plans

description: Show visual charts and graphs of user's fitness progress over time
steps: Navigate to progress section
View different chart types (weight, strength, workout frequency)
Select different time ranges for data display
Verify charts update with real user data
Test chart interactions and zoom functionality

description: Display chronological list of completed workouts with details
steps: Navigate to workout history section
View list of past workouts sorted by date
Select a specific workout to view details
Verify all exercise data is displayed correctly
Test filtering and sorting options

description: Allow users to add friends and view their workout activities
steps: Navigate to social/friends section
Search for friends by username or email
Send friend requests to other users
Accept incoming friend requests
View friends' recent workout activities

description: Ensure all user data is properly saved and retrieved across app sessions
steps: Log workout data and close the app
Reopen the app after some time
Verify all previously entered data is still present
Test data persistence across app updates
Confirm data syncs properly if using cloud storage

description: Allow users to create and save their own custom workout routines
steps: Navigate to workout creation screen
Add exercises from the library to create routine
Set target sets, reps, and rest times
Save the custom workout with a name
Verify custom workout appears in user's workout list

description: Provide rest timers and workout duration tracking during exercise sessions
steps: Start a workout session
Complete a set and start rest timer
Verify timer counts down correctly
Test timer notifications and alerts
Confirm total workout duration is tracked

description: Display a feed of friends' workout activities and achievements
steps: Navigate to social activity feed
View recent activities from friends
Like or comment on friends' activities
Verify feed updates with new activities
Test pull-to-refresh functionality

description: Award badges and achievements for reaching fitness milestones
steps: Complete actions that should trigger achievements
Verify achievement notifications appear
Navigate to achievements/badges section
View earned and unearned achievements
Confirm achievement progress is tracked

description: Filter and search exercises by muscle group, equipment, or difficulty
steps: Navigate to exercise library
Apply filters for muscle group and equipment
Search for exercises using keywords
Verify filtered results are accurate
Clear filters and confirm all exercises return

description: Allow users to securely log out of their accounts
steps: Navigate to profile or settings
Find and tap logout option
Confirm logout action if prompted
Verify user is redirected to login screen
Confirm user data is cleared from device
